title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 262 - Allocation Of Wages And Net Earnings From Self-employment To The City Of Yonkers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 262 - Allocation Of Wages And Net Earnings From Self-employment To The City Of Yonkers

State Regulations
§ 262.1 - Allocation of wage or salary income to the City of Yonkers
§ 262.2 - Allocation of net earnings from self-employment to the City of Yonkers
§ 262.3 - Special rules for real estate
§ 262.4 - Other methods of allocation
§ 262.5 to 262.8 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 262

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 697[a], 1342; Codes
and Ordinances of the City of Yonkers, §
92-113

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
